definition: Mt Potala at Zhoushan 舟山市 in Zhejiang, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Guanyin 觀音|观音 (Avalokiteśvara)
general/popular/everywhere/universal
(phonetic)/declivity/steep bank
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: It is storied that Mahasthamaprapta preached in Putuo Mount of Zhejiang.
sentences.chinese: 相傳其顯靈說法的道場在浙江普陀山。

sentences.english: In 1993, he took Refuges again under the venerable Master Wudao in Puji Temple in Mount Putuo.
sentences.chinese: 一九九三年於普陀山普濟寺皈依上悟下道大和尚。

sentences.english: The faithful believers are never seen before at Putuo Mount.
sentences.chinese: 普陀山上看到虔誠的信徒集體朝拜。

sentences.english: So is Buddhist culture of Goddess Mercy in Mount Putuo.
sentences.chinese: 普陀山的觀音文化亦應作如是觀。

sentences.english: It only takes you 1 hour to Putuo mountain with High-speed liner.
sentences.chinese: 乘高速客輪僅1小時可到達海天佛國普陀山。

sentences.english: Mt Putuo, the Buddhist Kingdom on the sea, in one of the four famous Buddhust mountains in China.
sentences.chinese: 海天佛國普陀山是中國佛教四大名山之一。

sentences.english: Puo Mountain is a famous tourist resort in East China. It is located in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 普陀山位於浙江省，是中國東部的一個著名旅遊勝地。

sentences.english: The Buddhist culture of Putuo Mountain has a long history and rich connotations .
sentences.chinese: 普陀山佛教文化，源遠流長，豐富多彩。

sentences.english: Today, Mount Putuo is the largest oblation place for Kwan-yin Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 直至今日，普陀山已是最有名的祭拜觀音的聖地。

sentences.english: They were debating whether to go to the Mount Putuo or the Mount Yandang just now.
sentences.chinese: 剛纔他們在辯論是到普陀山去還是到雁蕩山去。

sentences.english: At the southeast side of Puji Temple Euphorbia melanohydrata three treasures of Mt Putuo stands beside the lotus pool.
sentences.chinese: 普濟寺東南，海印池旁立有普陀山三寶之一的多寶塔。

sentences.english: Putuo Mountain becomes a busy and crowded place of worship for Buddhists and all snakes then disappear from sight.
sentences.chinese: 從此，普陀山上香火旺盛，蛇的蹤影也隨之不見了。

sentences.english: Mount Putuo is one of China's four famous Buddhist mountains.
sentences.chinese: 普陀山是我國四大佛教名山之一。

definition: Putuo district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang
Mt Jiuhua in Anhui, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Kṣitigarbha 地藏
Shengsi Islands, making up Shengsi county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]
Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤
Shengsi county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Jinshan Temple, where Fahai lives (from Madam White Snake)
Daishan county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Zhoushan prefecture level city in Zhejiang (consisting solely of islands)/formerly Dinghai 定海
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤[Pu3 xian2]/Emeishan city
Dinghai district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang/Qing dynasty name of 舟山市
Zhoushan Island
Meizhou Island (Putian)
